If possible people shouldn't think about who needs to be assigned to a question. This should be done automatically. In our case we want to assign Polarion and configuration questions automatically to ourselves.

  • Open Administration>Work Items>Auto-assignment
  • Create a configuration which assigns your user to a question if topic field contains Polarion or configuration.
  • Verify in the frontend that your auto assignment is working during creation.
Create a new rule which auto-assigns questions to you if their topic is Polarion or it's about configuration
